subject: My Order Missing Parts
description_text:
﻿My Wife Bought Me Some of your pedals on for Christmas on  Amazon and I received them today and they are missing the heel plate and the base plate and the heightining plate and bolts 

ORDER WAS UNDER NAME REBECCA LANE 
smiles33099@icloud.com
PLS LET ME KNOW WHAT ELSE NEEDED TO RESOLVE THIS THANK YOU

conversations.body_text: So trying to view the ticket that you have created but when I go to register it says my email is already in use and when I try to reset the password it says u do not have access Sent from my iPhone
Hi Bobby L,  Alright, please don’t worry. I’ve confirmed with our operations team that the base plate was out of stock. It has arrived at the warehouse today, and we will ship it to you today.
